institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Industry-led youth customized training business operation rules/Article 15 (Selection of partner training institutions)
contents: Article 15 (Selection of a partner training institution) ① The joint training center may select a partner training institution to foster efficient human resources. ② Institutions that can participate as partner training institutions under paragraph 1 are as follows: 1. Vocational competency development training facilities under the 「Employee Vocational Competency Development Act」, 2. Employers' organizations and their associations, 3. 「Higher Education Act」 Universities, junior colleges, 4. Lifelong education facilities under the Lifelong Education Act, 5. Lifelong vocational education academies under the Act on the Establishment of Academies and Extracurricular Teaching, 6. Act on the Management of Public Institutions. 7. Facilities or institutions that can provide vocational competency development training in accordance with other laws and regulations; ③ If a joint training center intends to utilize a partner training institution, training of the selected partner training institution. Details of the plan and training costs to be paid to partner training institutions must be included in the training plan. ④ Institutions participating as partner training institutions cannot participate in the project repeatedly under the status of a joint training center. However, you can participate in training conducted at several joint training centers.
